name: AMB_YN_COND_CD
description: This table holds the yes/no condition or response codes for claim level ambulance data.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim value record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AMB_COND_CD_YN
columns.description: This item holds the yes/no condition or response code (CRC02) for claim level ambulance certifications.
